TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerDataConnection extends System.Object

summary.span: 在设计工具中表示到数据存储区的连接。

span.span: Represents a connection to a data store in a design tool.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示的数据存储中的设计工具的连接。The object represents a connection to a data store in the design tool. 通常作为的一部分返回对象属性，并通过读取应用程序的配置文件或通过调用创建方法。Typically a object is returned as part of the property, and is created either by reading the application's configuration file or by calling the method.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public DesignerDataConnection (string name, string providerName, string connectionString);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, string providerName, string connectionString) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, providerName As String, connectionString As String)
public: DesignerDataConnection(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ providerName, System::String ^ connectionString);

span.span: The name associated with this connection.

param.name: providerName
param.span: 用于访问基础数据存储区的提供程序对象的名称

span.span: The name of the provider object used to access the underlying data store

param.name: connectionString
param.span: 指定如何连接数据存储区的字符串。

span.span: The string that specifies how to connect to the data store.

summary.span: 使用指定的名称、数据提供程序和连接字符串初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, data provider, and connection string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建不会从应用程序的配置文件创建的对象。Use this constructor to create objects that are not created from the application's configuration file. 当你使用此构造函数，属性设置为`false`。When you use this constructor, the property is set to `false`.

span.span: to indicate the connection was created from information stored in the application's configuration file; otherwise, .

summary.span: 用指定的名称、数据提供程序和连接字符串，并指示连接是否是从配置文件加载的，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, data provider, and connection string, and indicates whether the connection was loaded from a configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您需要指定的值时使用此构造函数属性，如当创建从存储在应用程序的配置文件的信息的对象。Use this constructor when you need to specify the value of the property, such as when you are creating a object from information stored in the application's configuration file. 属性设置为的值`isConfigured`参数。The property is set to the value of the `isConfigured` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ConnectionString { get; }
.property instance string ConnectionString
Public ReadOnly Property ConnectionString As String
public: property System::String ^ ConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取为连接定义的应用程序连接字符串。

span.span: Gets the application connection string defined for the connection.

value.span: 为连接定义的应用程序连接字符串。

span.span: The application connection string defined for the connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含应用程序用于连接到数据存储的连接字符串。The property contains the connection string used by the application for connecting to the data store. 必须使用方法以返回适合使用连接字符串，在设计环境中。You must use the method to return a connection string suitable for use in the design environment.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsConfigured { get; }
.property instance bool IsConfigured
Public ReadOnly Property IsConfigured As Boolean
public: property bool IsConfigured { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示连接信息是否在应用程序的配置文件中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the connection information is in the application's configuration file.

value.span: 如果连接是在应用程序的配置文件中定义的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the connection is defined in the application's configuration file; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将为`true`如果对象从应用程序的配置文件中读取或如果对象写入应用程序的配置文件的方法。The property will be `true` if the object was read from the application's configuration file, or if the object was written to the application's configuration file by the method. 当是`true`、属性设置为连接的名称中定义[connectionStrings 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de)的配置文件。When the is `true`, the property is set to the name of the connection as defined in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) of the configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Name { get; }
.property instance string Name
Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the name of the data connection.
The name of the data connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用于标识应用程序配置文件或数据连接的列表中的特定连接的名称。The property contains the name that identifies a specific connection in an application configuration file or a list of data connections. 当属性是`true`，属性用作`name`属性中[connectionStrings 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de)配置元素，或从返回方法。When the property is `true`, property is used as the `name` attribute in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) configuration element, or is returned from the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ProviderName { get; }

public: property System::String ^ ProviderName { System::String ^ get(); };
